DOC.brief_title: The Influence Fish-oil Lipid Emulsions Neonatal Morbidities
DOC.detailed_description: During study period , preterm infant admit NICU include . Infants weigh < 1500 gr deliver prematurely 32nd week gestation eligible study . Infants major congenital anomaly , congenital infection inborn metabolic error exclude study . Group 1 : Fish-oil emulsion ( 20 % SMOFLipid : soybean oil 60 g/dL , MCT 60 g/dL , olive oil 50 g/dL , fish oil 30 g/dL , egg phospholipid 12 g/dL , glycerol 25 g/dL , vitamin E 200 mg α-TE/L ) Group 2 : Soybean oil emulsion ( 20 % Intralipid : soybean oil 200 g/dL , egg phospholipid 12 g/dL , glycerol 22,5 g/dL , vitamin E 57 mg α-TE/L ) .
